name: The Junkyard (AbigailChristian)
description:
This is the final level to the group project for project 2 MDIA 322.

Here are the links to levels 1 and 2:

To move, use the arrow keys. To switch characters, press space.  Each character has its own quirks, R0G3R can fit through small gaps and use levers, ST3V3 can jump, and FR3Y4 can push heavy objects. (Hint, just in case: R0G3R can get lost in large piles of trash). Use these three to escape the factory!
